import React ,{useState}from 'react' import './EmployeeAdd.css' import { assets } from '../../assets/assets' import axios from 'axios' function EmployeeAdd() { const [profilepicture, setProfilepicture] = useState(false) const [application, setApplication] = useState(false) const [passport, setPassport] = useState(false) const [data,setData] = useState({ name:"", age:"", birthday:"", email:"", address:"", phonenumber:"", passport:"", citizen:"", religion:"", qualification:"" }) const handleInputFields = async (e)=>{ const name = e.target.name const value = e.target.value setData((data)=>({...data,[name]:value})) console.log(data) } const handleSubmit = async()=>{ let finalData = {...data, profilepicture, } console.log(finalData) await axios.post("http://localhost:4000/employee/add",finalData) } return (
